page.title: 20THE BLACKO DOMESDAY TEAM
page.content: The information about this block was gathered by the junior children of Blacko County Primary School in June 1985. They went to Whitehough Camp School for a week. They slept each night and explored the Domesday Block during the day. Their findings were recorded in booklets and an example can be found in the {DOMESDAY BOX buried near Blacko School. The children who took part are:- Helen Jackson, Helen Brown, Jane Ireland, Ruth Sutton, Nicola Manley, Carrie Hesketh, Kathryn Hunt, Alexandra Lane, Michell Manley, Lisa Woodward, Andrew Fothergill, Simon Dawdry, Glyn Ford, Daniel Reed, David Kitchingman, Ian Atkinson, Simon Dixon, Irfan Haque, David Brown, Phillip Harrison. The following adults have contributed written work - J.Wright, J.Jackson, J.Walton, C.Graham, Y.Holden.
